name: The Committee
storyline: Something is rotten in the state of London. An old man refuses to go gracefully to the Tomb-Colonies. He claims to have unfinished business. Delve into secrets best left buried and uncover the last regret of a once brilliant servant.
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for November, 2019. Third and final entry in the Season of Propinquity.
